One world — 7.5 billion unique faces.

Celebrate unity in diversity on Thursday's #SolidarityDay and every day: https://t.co/DfveYuuXte https://t.co/oupSz8aYHT

“Perhaps the most precious – and increasingly scarce – resource in our world today is dialogue” -- @antonioguterres stressed importance of multilateralism at @DohaForum this week: https://t.co/SaUcfXQjQz https://t.co/OO9CWwFMYU
Every year, 3 million children die of hunger or malnutrition. Help #FeedOurFuture on Thursday's #SolidarityDay. https://t.co/h6cesmIr4Y via @WFP https://t.co/c7kMARy1Yz
The new Global Compact #ForMigration could help shift negative perceptions of migrants. Latest edition of UN @AfricaRenewal explains: https://t.co/aICLgDEm8S https://t.co/DLjQSpJkQe
On Thursday's #SolidarityDay & every day, stand with the @WFP and demand a world where no child goes hungry. https://t.co/dTY5OEgNgy #FeedOurFuture https://t.co/5t5kQhScxL
In final briefing to the Security Council, veteran negotiator Staffan de Mistura urged international community to "unite as one" to advance Syria political process. https://t.co/vcwudsJZbo
#UNGA formally endorses the Global Compact #ForMigration - for a life of safety & dignity for all people on the move. https://t.co/DI4BEQDni8 https://t.co/vgMK6f6A80

Data is a critical for improving responses to humanitarian crises around the world. See how the Centre for Humanitarian Data is making a difference: https://t.co/2y8XaP7fmg #Data4Humanity https://t.co/YlreYH2GDH

"Human rights defenders give voice to the voiceless & shield the powerless against injustice" -- @antonioguterres at Tuesday's 2018 @UNHumanRights Prize Award ceremony https://t.co/gxCA5zl2sh #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/sEsW53UHll

The next influenza pandemic is not about 'if', but 'when'. @WHO works to ensure that all countries, irrespective of income or development status, have access to counter-measures needed to respond. https://t.co/gmGEOOnk9C #GlobalGoals https://t.co/gFbpUP6Mzf

Honouring the winners of the 2018 @UNHumanRights Prize:

🥇Dublin-based @FrontLineHRD

258 million migrants = 258 million stories, journeys & memories.

A humanitarian response plan for the occupied Palestinian territory calls for $350 million to assist over a million people in urgent need: https://t.co/Ii9FoKBCUo

Monday's endorsement of the Global #RefugeeCompact will mean a stronger, fairer global response for millions of people on the move & the communities that host them. https://t.co/NuGYlcrgYV #WithRefugees https://t.co/0EXEWb2x3n
On Tuesday at UNHQ in NYC: UN Human Rights Prize 2018 award ceremony: https://t.co/74BWeOYgwZ #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/LxbnDV3AgI
On Monday at UNHQ in NYC: #UNGA to consider Global #RefugeeCompact. Details: https://t.co/ScQO8CIXvi #WithRefugees https://t.co/21RcVGJgMe
What's happening this week at the UN? International #MigrantsDay, #RefugeeCompact, Human Solidarity Day & more. List of meetings here: https://t.co/28eSBlzspk https://t.co/VVMy4hwZe0

Humanitarian aid saved this young girl from Iraq, but millions more around the world still need your help. This holiday season, #InvestInHumanity and give something that matters: https://t.co/W81Ahb0BYh via @unocha https://t.co/s6bRGGdyKu
Women in @UNpeacekeeping act as role models, inspiring women & girls in male-dominated societies to push for rights: https://t.co/CxDDacdWT1 https://t.co/Y4oV7yph3c
The @Tokyo2020 Olympics have joined the race against climate change through @UNFCCC's new sports #ClimateAction initiative: https://t.co/60GxNHdFCg #GlobalGoals https://t.co/Wql0sMncNL

#StandUp4HumanRights

Here's how the UN family marked 70 years of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights on this week's #HumanRightsDay.  https://t.co/eZ2h3tubls

Go behind-the-scenes at this week's Global Compact #ForMigration conference in Marrakech where leaders & influencers came together to help ensure a life of safety & dignity for all migrants, everywhere: https://t.co/j4qpA10YrR https://t.co/jewzueuo0Q
https://t.co/dXoL2uckNq

At 13, Egypt is making strides in the NYC fashion industry while taking a stand against bullying & body shaming. Her story: https://t.co/Vk76RwiK1e via @africarenewal #StandUpForHumanRights https://t.co/dKJsfiWsuH

"I count on all of you to raise ambitions so that we can beat back climate change." -- @antonioguterres on successful conclusion to UN Climate Conference #COP24: https://t.co/yY5IY1fQha https://t.co/UWviKUkElp

“The United Nations must lead by example." -- @antonioguterres on the UN's #ClimateAction efforts, including its goal to be climate neutral by 2020. https://t.co/CyYIV55D6X  #GlobalGoals https://t.co/bo4wOR6L3n

From singing to football, @UNFPA held activities with Rohingya refugees in Bangladesh during the #16Days of activism against gender-based violence. Here are some of the highlights: https://t.co/IGZaIwS6HE via @UNFPABangladesh https://t.co/iMQLcRZ3QO

More than $1 trillion is paid out in bribes every year. Supporting peace, justice & strong institutions is critical for tackling corruption and achieving the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/W9ZIdMy6GE https://t.co/U5deF4CANu
"Join the team in the race against climate change!" --  @UNICEFCanada Ambassador @Concacaf's @KarinaLeBlanc calls for #ClimateAction at #COP24. https://t.co/totxzdZPc4 https://t.co/OhDB4dwHih
After tough negotiation at the UN Climate Conference #COP24, the world came together to break new ground and take ambitious #ClimateAction. https://t.co/totxzdZPc4 https://t.co/ibx65wHILe
Meet Megara, who was stalked & sexually harassed by a stranger she met on a bus while people looked the other way: https://t.co/Gx9jp8QzmM via @UNFPA #MyStoryCountsToo https://t.co/GPFvbBqPaH

Watch what happened when @antonioguterres sat down in Marrakech this week with youth advocates from around the 🌍 to hear their solutions #ForMigration. ⬇️ https://t.co/H12U0WrOKf https://t.co/hbMhSfYHrP

70 years after the adoption of the #PreventGenocide Convention, the stories of Holocaust survivors are being shared in new ways thanks to @USCShoahFdn https://t.co/QWcDT9gEBi #StrongerThanHate https://t.co/yUtKPoqhGm

The key to success on climate change is cooperation. -- Kim Hellström explains why @HM joined the Fashion Industry Charter for #ClimateAction at #COP24. https://t.co/btmI8pVKGO https://t.co/vbXqIasdTy

The @UNPeacekeeping mission in Sierra Leone disarmed & demobilized more than 75,000 former combatants, including child soldiers. More about how #ServingForPeace saves lives & makes a difference ⬇️
https://t.co/zk1OTVWSWR

As we mark 70 years since the adoption of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights, @UNDPEurasia shares stories of strength, courage and justice ➡️ https://t.co/Ak7OIfXzMM #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/RNmpPvgDTp
Venezuela: @UNmigration & @Refugees launch $738M appeal to help  countries &  communities hosting 3M Venezuelan refugees & migrants. https://t.co/DQNDKVvmXI
Iceland is working to preserve its natural beauty. At #COP24, its Environment Minister shares a personal #climateaction story. https://t.co/totxzehq3C https://t.co/73c6JLwouT
There are many myths & falsehoods about the Global Compact #ForMigration. Here are the facts ⬇️ https://t.co/M6U69aXbah

Peace, justice & strong institutions are the foundations of strong & thriving societies -- and are critical building blocks for the achievement of the #GlobalGoals ➡️ https://t.co/W9ZIdMy6GE https://t.co/Y7ekGKTBsj

Why is @UNHumanRights chief @mbachelet at #COP24? - Because "climate change is a terrible threat to humanity. We need urgent #ClimateAction to stop it now!" https://t.co/9DuqoToSXR https://t.co/3csAVW4dP4

"Every single degree of global warming makes an enormous difference for our planet. So, let's work together on #ClimateAction." -- Germany's @SvenjaSchulze68 at #COP24. https://t.co/totxzehq3C https://t.co/dwz0xPxtYR

Yemen: agreements reached in Sweden are expected to improve humanitarian access & flow of goods to the civilians, improving the living conditions for millions https://t.co/0TbAyod7SQ https://t.co/lDADdifwrL
"We need to ask ourselves: what can we do better?" -- @UNEnvironment’s @satyatripathi stresses the need for collective #ClimateAction at #COP24: https://t.co/totxzdZPc4 https://t.co/BwSKKm8kBo

“When you are born, you know no hate, you know no pain, you know no discrimination. That stuff is taught to us as children” – @therobenx, an entertainer & activist with albinism on the dangers of bullying. #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/epMZMnBoqj https://t.co/x30m0QYfxJ

This Syrian 🚴‍♀️initiative won a @Momentum_UNFCCC award at #COP24 for challenging gender stereotypes and promoting youth & women's empowerment as well as #ClimateAction. https://t.co/1hxCwuCMTa https://t.co/fqfffjOtGU

"You have the future of Yemen in your hands" – updates from @antonioguterres in Sweden on peace process, agreements reached, establishment of a ceasefire & more. https://t.co/oIYHeUTqMA https://t.co/7rZnTofTeR
The UN is making sweeping changes to how it does business in order to improve its effectiveness and efficiency. See how ➡️ https://t.co/NA8GiXg5eV https://t.co/RrkC7fhViW

17 big sporting organizations - including @UEFA, @iocmedia & more - joined the race against climate change with the launch of the Sports Climate Action Framework at the UN Climate Conference #COP24 in Poland this week. https://t.co/nloqmX4fyz https://t.co/PMJGnZGoiv

Youth champions Timoci from Fiji & Hanna from Poland call for everyone to take #ClimateAction to achieve the #ParisAgreement climate goals. "Talanoa Call for Action" info: https://t.co/TdKIgpFON5  #COP24 via @UNFCCC https://t.co/8XPgdJi8lR
Resistance to global Compact #ForMigration will dissipate when countries see the benefits — Ellen Johnson Sirleaf, chair of Africa Migration Panel https://t.co/yta6jQckPA https://t.co/peE1MhcmJx
On Wednesday, @antonioguterres returned to the UN Climate Conference in Poland to appeal for consensus on a strong outcome of #COP24. https://t.co/Y3qvIb0DWl https://t.co/atIPJZQYBJ

"Katowice must be the dawn of a new determination to unleash the promise of the #ParisAgreement." — @antonioguterres’ appeal at UN Climate Conference #COP24. https://t.co/tDcCbs0Kr0 https://t.co/AtcLbY1p2e

164 countries adopted the historic Global Compact #ForMigration in Marrakech, Morroco, to improve the lives of all people on the move. More in our special @Instagram story ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQBPYqm https://t.co/yNUEAq31O8
https://t.co/oDuczFq8Mn

"Failing in Katowice would send a disastrous message to those who stand ready to shift to a green economy. So, I urge you to find common ground that will allow us to show the world that we are listening, that we care." -- @antonioguterres at #COP24: https://t.co/tDcCbs0Kr0 https://t.co/sS9MTD8IhO
https://t.co/lAuxamLmIT
Neutrality is critical for the UN to gain & maintain the confidence & cooperation of all. Wednesday is Int'l Neutrality Day: https://t.co/bcCndsqNsH https://t.co/O7SFEWgEau

We must beat climate change before it beats us. It is a race we can win. It is a race we must win. 

@antonioguterres is back at Climate Conference #COP24 with an urgent appeal: a strong agreement in Poland is absolutely necessary. https://t.co/s2zQgqgGJy https://t.co/FpP2OVyIJh

Go behind-the-scenes at the Global Compact #ForMigration conference in Marrakech, Morocco where leaders & influencers came together to help ensure a life of safety & dignity for all migrants, everwhere. More 📷 here: https://t.co/j4qpA10YrR https://t.co/bBFuZ9FCj3

Health is a human right, not a luxury. Poverty should not be a cause of ill health or a barrier to accessing care when needed. 

More on Wednesday's #HealthForAll Day: https://t.co/I1IqiOIood https://t.co/BUSyumamDz
164 countries adopted the historic Global Compact #ForMigration in Marrakech, Morroco, to improve the lives of all people on the move. More in our special @Instagram story ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQBPYqm

The UN provides impartial mediation to prevent & de-escalate conflict.
Wednesday is International Neutrality Day https://t.co/bcCndsqNsH https://t.co/ep28ZM0ato

1 billion more people need to benefit from Universal Health Coverage before 2030 for countries to achieve the #GlobalGoals.

Support @WHO to make #HealthForAll a reality. Here's how: https://t.co/e1eiqsFOL5 https://t.co/8mCrdSJi8N
Watch what happened when @antonioguterres sat down in Marrakech with youth advocates from around the 🌍 to hear their views & solutions #ForMigration. ⬇️ https://t.co/DjvUZ10u1R

World leaders celebrate “the true story of migration", as conference on Global Compact #ForMigration closes. See what else people were saying in Marrakech, Morocco on Tuesday ⬇️ https://t.co/3i1KBjeJzL

"We will see lives saved, living conditions improved, communities integrate & flourish through increased development & prosperity." -- @Louise_Arbour at closing of Global Compact #ForMigration conference: https://t.co/XCyt1pKIje https://t.co/hEYGEkBQe0

After 5 days of UN-mediated consultations, Yemen government & opposition discuss re-opening country's main airport, de-escalating hostilities in Taiz & Hudaydah & prisoner exchange ➡️ https://t.co/j5selecHXS

"There is an inevitability of the consequences of climate change that we are dealing with" -- at #COP24, New Zealand's @jamespeshaw talks about his country's #ClimateAction efforts: https://t.co/jO2ZLRHc4W https://t.co/0jhZdKxMtW

Mountains are home to rare animals such as gorillas, snow leopards & beautiful plants such as orchids.

Spread the word that #MountainsMatter on Tuesday's #MountainDay⛰️🗻: https://t.co/t3hhVrQgn5 https://t.co/DtFohXBgjN

"We need to reduce emissions by 40-50% by 2030. That takes a lot of work. That takes a lot of commitment, but it's possible & we need to do it." -- Norway's @olaelvestuen appeals for urgent #ClimateAction at #COP24. https://t.co/totxzehq3C https://t.co/ytOCJ4eizH

Migrants are, first & foremost, human beings and regardless of their migratory status, they are entitled to the same human rights as the rest of humanity -@UN_PGA on adoption of landmark Global Compact #ForMigration. https://t.co/kNENiRTXgN https://t.co/fNgAuInTTx

“Climate change is not only an environmental issue, it’s also a human rights issue & it’s related to migration & peace in the world.” -- @Lise_Kingo from the @GlobalCompact at #COP24. https://t.co/pVhRuOCPqI #ClimateAction https://t.co/crC5FkdRwP

Mountains cover 22% of the earth's land surface, yet they are under threat from climate change & more.

Tell the world that #MountainsMatter & take action on Tuesday's Int'l Mountain Day: https://t.co/TJB3XFQ3c1 https://t.co/repYSJ03Fa

History was made on  #HumanRightsDay in Marrakech with the adoption of the Global Compact #ForMigration. Here is more on what happened in Morocco on Monday. https://t.co/npIFpqek91 https://t.co/sbYMC1IjNJ

"Here at the UN Climate Conference in Poland we are talking about how to do less harm to our planet." -- #COP24 President @KurtykaMichal. https://t.co/totxzdZPc4 #ClimateAction https://t.co/65z0T6LnKh

👚👕👔👗Top fashion industry labels & manufacturers - including @adidas, @HM & @Target - launched Fashion Industry Charter for #ClimateAction at #COP24 to address climate impact of fashion sector. https://t.co/btmI8pVKGO https://t.co/cSfMVsvE1t

70 years since the adoption of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights:

➡️ the lives of millions have been improved
➡️ untold human suffering has been prevented, and 
➡️ the foundations for a more just world have been laid.

https://t.co/2YXykxGwOQ #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/LyG06okajf

Watch live: @antonioguterres, @mbachelet & more mark 70th anniversary of Universal Declaration of Human Rights at special #HumanRightsDay event in Marrakech. #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/OYBHFcKs4T

"We need to make sure everyone is part of this transition, everyone has jobs, everyone is succeeding.” -- @ec_minister about importance of a just transition to a green economy. Full interview from #COP24: https://t.co/W8KbQuJ2mg https://t.co/DMjAovO1Df
Indigenous people from around the 🌍 demand urgent #ClimateAction at UN Climate Conference #COP24 in Poland. https://t.co/zmDgsJpbkI https://t.co/Bm2MLmsbUc

Let’s work together for a safer, less fearful and more prosperous future for both for our own societies and for the world’s migrants. -@antonioguterres to world leaders gathered to adopt the Global Compact #ForMigration. https://t.co/sQTiZ5pLDb https://t.co/v4Gmy34W8K

Watch live as leaders from 150+ countries adopt a Global Compact #ForMigration -- for a life of safety & dignity for all people on the move. 

https://t.co/w8oKT9DgnH
